DOC.brief_summary: This pilot study utilize trans-abdominal ECG Doppler Ultrasounds assess feasibility extract fECGs volunteer population .
DOC.criteria: Subjects must pregnant woman least 18 year age . Subject 's fetus must gestational age 16 week term . Subjects must able tolerate 20 minute ( per fetus transabdominal ECG Doppler ultrasounds perform ) supine position . Subjects willing provide inform consent willing participate procedure necessary complete study . Subjects must physical mental condition , opinion investigator , limit ability provide adequate consent .
